Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: It's really normal to bloat when your weight starts getting low and you have been restricting calories. Your body has to get used to eating food and processing it through the digestive tract, plus you get muscle wastage around the digestive tract. Professionals generally don't like looking into food intolerances until you've been at a healthy weight for some time, as refeeding has all the same symptoms as an intolerance.
